author: Simon Difford
description: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1: Duck fat washed Jack Daniel’s Old No. 7Pour bottle of Jack Daniel’s into pan with 200g duck fat. Cook on low heat until duck fat melted. Allow to cool enough to pour into a sealable container and then freeze. This will allow the duck fat to be strained out of the whiskey. Return the duck fat washed whiskey to bottle for use. Special ingredient #2: Pear & Honey PoscaSkin 5 pears and cook with bottle of white wine and ½ cup of honey until pears become translucent. Strain throw coffee filter and bottle ready for use. Special ingredient #3: Tansy & pisco tinctureInfuse 200ml pisco with 5 soup spoons of tansy for 3 days or cook for 3 hours/55˚C in water bath. Strain through coffee filter and the tincture is ready to use.
